title: This version of XScreenSaver is very old! Please upgrade!
description:
XScreensaver has been around for a really long time and during that time it's had it's fair share updates along with distros shipping old versions so the dev has a warning informing users of this, or at least it does until distros get annoyed by being out of date and remove it.
